name: Eternal Slumber Party
summary: Eternal Slumber Party (often shortened to ESP) is a 2014 megawad for Doom II, created by TimeOfDeath and released on September 1, 2014. It is a collection of maps that TimeOfDeath had previously released as standalone PWADs, or as submissions to larger community projects. It received a sequel, Eternal Slumber Party II, in 2018.
